messages.content: Thank you for calling Danone customer service. My name is Fred. May I know your name?
Hello Fred, my name is Zachary.
Hi Zachary! How can I assist you today?
I have some issues with my account and I also have questions about your Activia product.
I can certainly help with that. First, let's address your account issue. What seems to be the problem?
I tried logging in, but it keeps saying my password is incorrect. I even tried resetting it, but I didn\'t receive any email.
I\'m sorry to hear that, Zachary. Let me check your account details. Could you please provide me with your email address associated with the account?
Thank you. Please give me a moment to look into this.

I have checked your account details, and it appears there was a temporary glitch in our system. I have manually reset your password and sent a reset link to your email. Can you please check your inbox?
Ok, I\'ll check. Got it, thanks. Now about the Activia product, I\'ve heard it\'s good for digestion. Is that true?
Yes, Activia is known for its probiotic benefits, which can aid in digestion. Do you have any specific questions about it?
Would it be safe to consume daily? I\'ve had mixed experiences with probiotics before.

Everyone\'s body reacts differently, but Activia is designed for daily consumption. It\'s always best to start with a small amount and see how your body reacts. If you have any concerns, you should consult with a healthcare professional.
Alright, I\'ll give it a try. Thanks for the help, Fred.
You\'re welcome, Zachary! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
